name: District Builder the game
description:
A game that mix the classic RTS with city builder mechanics. Manage the citizens, plant, harvest, raise animals, collect resources, build, drive and more!

Features:

10 different citizen profission.

3 plantation types (potato, cabbage and sunflower)

3 Fence types

2 Different Gates

1 animal (sheeps and pigs are comming!)

12 buildings as shops, water well, houses and wind farm.

2 road types.

1 car (added more soon).
